医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现在常规实验室测试中没有临床上有用的长期新冠病毒生物标志物目前使用的测试是否足以识别 SARS-CoV-2 (PASC) 的急性后遗症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-finds-no-clinically-useful-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-in-routine-lab-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-finds-no-clinically-useful-biomarkers-for-long-COVID-in-routine-lab-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d5a1d06-f92e-4f36-bf0f-416992f6e7da Wed, 14 Aug 2024 05:47:00 -0400 Study finds no clinically useful biomarkers for long COVID in routine lab tests
彻底改变类器官制造：Monmouth Scientific 2 级生物安全柜提高了 Molecular Devices 新生命科学设施的无菌性和效率。全球生命科学和 3D 生物学先驱 Molecular Devices 在卡迪夫建立了一个突破性的设施，致力于类器官的研究、开发和工业规模制造。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Revolutionising-organoid-manufacturing-Monmouth-Scientific-Class-2-Biological-Safety-Cabinets-enhance-sterility-and-efficiency-at-Molecular-Devices-新生命科学设施.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Revolutionising-organoid-manufacturing-Monmouth-Scientific-Class-2-Biological-Safety-Cabinets-enhance-sterility-and-efficiency-at-Molecular-Devices-新生命科学设施.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0369a4f6-9110-49a1-bedc-27d24c92f9b5 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 05:39:00 -0400 Revolutionising organoid manufacturing: Monmouth Scientific Class 2 Biological Safety Cabinets enhance sterility and efficiency at Molecular Devices' new Life Science facility.
新发现揭示了血清素如何塑造消极情况下的行为研究人员通过选择性血清素释放剂芬氟拉明增加突触血清素，以研究其对人类行为的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-findings-reveal-how-serotonin-shapes-behavior-in-male-situations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-findings-reveal-how-serotonin-shapes-behavior-in-male-situations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e4e9337-b113-4693-b494-bc9a75820ffd Wed, 14 Aug 2024 05:25:00 -0400 New findings reveal how serotonin shapes behavior in negative situations
体力活动对肠易激综合征肠道微生物群的影响不同类型和强度的体育锻炼对肠易激综合征患者肠道微生物群和症状缓解的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Impact-of-physical-activity-on-gut-microbiota-in-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Impact-of-physical-activity-on-gut-microbiota-in-irritable-bowel-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fc63d5a-0e0a-4102-801f-021022afd131 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Impact of physical activity on gut microbiota in irritable bowel syndrome
预计 2023 年欧洲将有超过 47,000 人因高温死亡研究人员预计，到 2023 年，整个欧洲将出现因年龄和性别而异的高温相关死亡人数。他们还计算了自 2000 年以来通过社会适应气温升高而节省的死亡负荷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Over-47000-heat-lated-deaths-estimated-to-have-occurred-in-Europe-in​​-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Over-47000-heat-lated-deaths-estimated-to-have-occurred-in-Europe-in​​-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12a2df88-02be-4221-961f-317ae44365c2 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 04:53:00 -0400 Over 47,000 heat-related deaths estimated to have occurred in Europe in 2023
COVID-19 疫苗推出阶段与美国成年人焦虑和抑郁的减少有关COVID-19 疫苗的各个推出阶段影响了该国成年人中抑郁和焦虑的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/COVID-19-vaccine-rollout-phases-linked-to-decreased-anxiety-and-depression-in-US-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/COVID-19-vaccine-rollout-phases-linked-to-decreased-anxiety-and-depression-in-US-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ff62b2d-6a59-453a-94b4-b52e2d5465be Wed, 14 Aug 2024 04:27:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccine rollout phases linked to decreased anxiety and depression in US adults
Sapio Sciences 与 CREO 宣布战略合作伙伴关系https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Sapio-Sciences-and-CREO-Announce-Strategic-Partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Sapio-Sciences-and-CREO-Announce-Strategic-Partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c71ec110-d1b5-4ea9-b159-9646ad2855df Wed, 14 Aug 2024 04:17:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences and CREO Announce Strategic Partnership
研究揭示盐基尼古丁和薄荷醇口味如何影响年轻人的电子烟使用研究发现，电子烟中的盐基尼古丁和薄荷醇调味料显着增加了年轻人的尼古丁水平和积极体验，可能会增加成瘾风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-how-salt-based-nicotine-and-menthol-flavors-influence-e-香烟-use-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-how-salt-based-nicotine-and-menthol-flavors-influence-e-香烟-use-in-young-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c88f9131-2154-4e73-9aed-050ef5760873 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 01:16:00 -0400 Study reveals how salt-based nicotine and menthol flavors influence e-cigarette use in young adults
更年期与认知问题风险增加有关全球有超过 2400 万人患有痴呆症，目前尚无治愈方法，因此人们非常关注预防和延缓认知障碍的方法。一项新的研究表明，潮热和抑郁等严重的更年期症状会对绝经后女性的认知功能产生负面影响。该研究结果今天在线发表在更年期协会杂志《更年期》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Menopause-linked-to-increased-risk-of-cognitive-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Menopause-linked-to-increased-risk-of-cognitive-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f527230-e556-4761-b1a8-f211e098cd44 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 00:46:18 -0400 Menopause linked to increased risk of cognitive issues
复杂植物分子合成的突破麻省理工学院的化学家开发了一种新方法来合成复杂分子，这些分子最初是从植物中分离出来的，具有作为抗生素、镇痛药或抗癌药物的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Breakthrough-in-synthesizing-complex-plant-molecules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Breakthrough-in-synthesizing-complex-plant-molecules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cbe5155-e1ee-4e51-8a8a-c13a4ed0200d Wed, 14 Aug 2024 00:26:04 -0400 Breakthrough in synthesizing complex plant molecules
